name: Super-Star Players Cup - Real Soccer For David Beckham and Lionel Messi Edition 2014
name_original: Super-Star Players Cup - Real Soccer For David Beckham and Lionel Messi Edition 2014
description:
******* Free SoccerJuggling Game! *******

********* Hours of juggling fun **********

Who will be the best juggler that can keep the ball in the air the longest? Would it be Beckham or Messi? Who are you cheering for?

Amazingly addicting, this is what this game is about. It’s the ultimate finger soccer ball skills test. It will challenge you to the core. Control the soccer ball with your fingers and achieve the highest score possible. Sounds intense? You bet it is! There are no second chances. One fall of the ball and all your efforts are no use.

With exceptionally clever level design, gorgeous graphics and solid dynamics, you'll want to keep playing and playing. Keep a friendly competition against your buddies and beat their score through the game’s online interactive interface.

Have you got what it takes to win?

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations and motions
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Amazing game physics

Harness the power of pure fun!

Download FREE Today!
